summary: An email from August 10, 2019, forwarding information about Jeffrey Epstein's release from custody on July 30, 2019, and noting he had an attorney visit starting at 8:20am that lasted all day. The sender mentions sending an attorney log next.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email, identified by his registration number 76318-054, who was released from custody on July 30, 2019, and had an attorney visit on that day.

events.title: Epstein's Release and Attorney Visit
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was released from custody and had an attorney visit starting at 8:20am that lasted all day.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was released from custody on July 30, 2019.
On the day of his release, Epstein had an attorney visit starting at 8:20am that lasted all day.
The email references a 'Psych Ops log book' and mentions an attorney log will be sent next.
